articles.summary: Democratic Republic of Congo and M23 rebel group sign new roadmap to peace in Qatar Topic: Unrest, Conflict and War 18h ago 18 hours ago Sat 15 Nov 2025 at 1:06pm Officials from the warring parties signed the document in Qatar. ( Reuters ) In short: The Democratic Republic of Congo and the M23 rebel group have signed a new roadmap to peace aimed at ending fighting in eastern Congo.
